original_text: But the Lord shall endure for ever: he hath prepared his throne for judgment.
korean_text: 여호와께서 영원히 앉으심이여 심판을 위하여 보좌를 준비하셨도다

sentences.original_text: But the Lord shall endure for ever:
he hath prepared his throne for judgment.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 심판을 위해 그의 보좌를 준비하셨습니다.
